narrow/narrow-minded
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
surname Lu
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Comes face to face with an adversary the brave victory, now judges true brave to be also too early.
sentences.chinese: 狹路相逢勇者勝，現在來判斷真正的勇者還爲時過早。

sentences.english: In a darkened hangar, the two confronted Dooku.
sentences.chinese: 在一個光線陰暗的機庫中，兩人與杜庫狹路相逢。

to be drowned (figurative and literal)

victor/winner
hissing sound/to hiss (as a sign of displeasure)
